sn45.32:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you one practicing wrongly and one practicing rightly.
sn45.32:1.5: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
sn45.32:1.6: This is called one practicing wrongly.
sn45.32:1.8: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.32:1.9: This is called one practicing rightly.”
